article.headline: Prairie View 66, Texas Southern 62
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Roderick Riley scored 26 points and grabbed 11 rebounds as Prairie View A&M beat Texas Southern 66-62 Saturday night for its first win after 11 losses this season. Riley was 8-of-11 from the field but just 10-of-17 from the line for Prairie View (1-11, 1-2 Southwestern Athletic). Prairie View also got 13 points from Tyrone Nelson and 10 from Adrian Simmons. Lionel Willis led Texas Southern (6-6, 2-1) with 17 points and nine rebounds. He was 6-of-11 from the field, including 3-of-5 on 3-pointers. Allen Lovett and Michael Sneed each added 13 points for TSU.
